content.title: Content Writer
content.description: Produce high-quality articles, blog posts, and web content for diverse industries. Collaborate with editors to refine content and meet deadlines.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in English, Journalism, or a related field
3+ years of professional content writing experience
Strong writing, editing, and research skills

content.title: Technical Content Writer
content.description: Write clear and concise technical documentation, user guides, and product manuals for software and hardware products.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Technical Communication or related field
Ability to simplify complex technical information

content.title: SEO Content Writer
content.description: Create SEO-optimized content including blog posts, articles, and website copy to improve organic search rankings.
requirements: Excellent writing and keyword research skills

content.description: Develop engaging and informative blog posts on trending topics. Collaborate with the editorial team to maintain a consistent tone and style.
requirements: Ability to research and write on diverse topics

requirements: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field
